title: Why do some people write with seemingly random upper and lower case letters? - Quora

response.answer_text: On various websites, words made up of random upper and lower case letters are often used to suggest that they are being voiced by a deranged person, as a means of conveying sarcasm. Commonly, such words are shown as being uttered by someone the poster is trying to belittle or portray as a toddler having a screaming tantrum.
